splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.description: Menya wabici ĩrĩa ĩrĩ hakuhĩ nawe ya IEBC
splash.disclaimer: Wĩtĩkĩrie ũkinyanĩria wa kũndũ gũcaria wabici ya IEBC kĩrĩa kĩrĩ hakuhĩ na ũhote gũkinya kuo na ihenya.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Hingũra gĩkari gĩaku gĩtheru na ũhihinye rĩngĩ

search.placeholder: Thuthuria wabici cia IEBC kũringana na county, gĩcigo kĩa gĩthurano, kana kũrĩa ciikaraga...
search.noMatchQuery: Gũtirĩ wabici ĩngĩigana ya "{{query}}". Geria njĩra ĩngĩ ya gũcaria.
search.noOfficesInArea: Gũtirĩ wabici ya IEBC yonekire gĩcigo-inĩ kĩanyu.

bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Hũthĩra njĩra ya gũkinya kũrĩa ũikaraga nĩguo ũhote kuona thogora wa ngari, ũheo njĩra cia kũrĩa ũikaraga, na wone njĩra ĩrĩa ĩrĩ hakuhĩ ya gũthiĩ wabici-inĩ ĩno.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Hũthĩra wabici nĩguo ũmenye njĩra ya gũthiĩ.
bottomSheet.bestRoute: Njĩra yaku ĩrĩa njega mũno nĩ kilomita {{distance}}, na nĩ ĩgũgũteithagia ndagĩka {{time}}
bottomSheet.trafficSurcharge: Ngarama ya Makĩria nĩ ũndũ wa Njira ĩiyũrĩte Ngari
bottomSheet.viewAllOptions: Rora Indo Ciaku ciothe cia Gũthuura
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Andũ a itũũra ya handũ rĩu no mamenyithie kana wabici ĩno nĩ ya ma.
bottomSheet.confirmThis: ĩkĩra hinya gũthuthuria wabici ĩno nĩ ĩrĩ kuo
bottomSheet.youConfirmed: Nĩ ũracaria wabici ĩno nĩ ĩĩ kuo
bottomSheet.peopleConfirmed_one: Mũndũ {{count}} nĩ arĩkĩtie kũmenyithia atĩ wabici ĩno nĩ ĩĩ kuo
bottomSheet.peopleConfirmed_other: Andũ {{count}} nĩ marĩkĩtie kũmenyithia atĩ wabici ĩno nĩ ĩĩ kuo
bottomSheet.within500m: No mũhaka ũikare mita 500 kuuma wabici
bottomSheet.oneConfirmation: Handũ kamwe tu harĩ o thimũ
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Ũrĩ mita {{distance}} kuuma harĩa ndĩ. Tũragwĩkĩra ngoro ũthiĩ o mita {{maxDistance}} kuuma wabici nĩguo ũmenye.
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Nĩ wagire kũruta ũira waku wa kũrĩa ũrĩ. Geria rĩngĩ.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Rutha ya gwetha handũ nĩ ũrabatarania nĩguo ũmenyithanio. Hũra kamũtĩ ka kũhingũra ũhoro wa Handũ na ũgerie rĩngĩ.

layers.standardDesc: Kĩoneki kĩrĩa Kĩerĩgĩrĩrũo kĩa Mũbango wa Barabara Mepu-inĩ
layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Ciikaro ciothe cia IEBC Kenya guothe
layers.constituenciesDesc: Mĩhaka ya mbunge na ya gĩthurano bũrũriinĩ wothe wa Kenya ta ũrĩa ĩtaarĩirio nĩ IEBC. O mũbango ũrũgamĩrĩire gĩcigo kĩmwe kĩa gĩthurano na rĩĩtwa rĩakĩo.
layers.healthcareFacilities: Mĩtabarĩre ya Ũgima wa Mwĩrĩ Kenya
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Kũgayanwo kwa mĩtaratara ya ũrigitani bũrũri-inĩ wothe (kũingĩha gwa data - no gũtware ndagĩka nini)
layers.locationPermissionRequired: Rutha ya kuona harĩa ũrĩ nĩ ũrabatarania
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Hũgũkĩra kana ũrute icunjĩ nĩguo ũhote kũgarũrĩra ũrĩa mepu yaku ĩroneka. No ũhote kũnyitithania ndemwa nyingĩ cia ũhoro na maratathi ngũrani ma mũthingi nĩguo ũhote kũhũthĩra njĩra ĩrĩa njega biũ.

contribute.title: Ongerera Handũ ha Wabici Hatarĩ Ho
contribute.description: Tũteithie gũthondeka mepu ya wabici ciothe cia IEBC Kenya yothe na njĩra ya gũtũhe ũhoro wa kũrĩa ciikaraga.
contribute.enterCoordinatesTab: Wekera mũhari wa latitude na longitude
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Kinyithia Kĩhũngĩro kĩa Google Maps kana Mũhari wa latitude kana longitude wa Google Maps.
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Mũhiano wa wabici, rũũri, kana gĩcigo kĩrĩa kĩũthiũrũrũkĩirie nĩ ũgũteithĩrĩria gũthuthuria
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Guuga na ũikũrũkie kana ũhihinye nĩguo ũrute
contribute.yourEmail: Andirethi ya ndũmĩrĩri ya thimũ yaku
contribute.reviewAndSubmit: 7. Rora na Ũtaũkĩrũo nĩ Ũndũ Ũrĩa Ũrathoma
contribute.locationPreview: Wĩrore mbere ũhoro wa harĩa ũrĩ
contribute.movePin: Tambũrũkia pini nĩguo ũhote kũrũnga harĩa ĩigĩtwo
contribute.locationAccuracyGood: Ũhoro ũrĩa wa ma nĩ mwega
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Wĩra waku nĩ ũrutĩtwo na nĩ ũgũcokio nĩ andũ arĩa marĩ na ũhoti.
contribute.submissionNote: Note: Kũrũgamĩrĩra nĩ ngwatanĩro ya rũrĩrĩ nĩ gũteithagia kũrũgamia. Nĩ ngatho nĩ ũndũ wa kũnyita itemi!
contribute.errorLocation: No ũheane ũhoro wa kũrĩa wabici ĩrĩ
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Coordinates itarĩ cia kĩhooto. Nĩ wega kũrora bata wa latitide na longitide
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Wĩtĩkĩrio wa kũiga handũ ndwarĩ mwĩtĩkĩrĩku. Twagũthaitha ũhingũre ũhoro wa harĩa ũrĩ.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Gũtiarĩ na ũhotani wa kũhingũra handũ. Hihinya wandĩke maũndũ macio na guoko.
contribute.parseError: Mũthondeki ũtarĩ wa ma. Hihinya ũhianĩre wa Google Maps kana ũthii wa na mbere.

uber.chapChapDesc: Thakisi cia Mithuthuthu - Nĩkũhiũha na nĩ cia goro
uber.uberXDesc: Mũthenya o mũthenya nĩ kũrĩ mbeca cia rugendo ria ngari
uber.comfortDesc: Ngaari njerũ irĩ na handũ ha kũiga magũrũ
